de.hsb.ms.syn.common.audio

Class Scale

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.audio.Scale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedFrequencyScale

    public class Scale
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class represents the musical scale corresponding to a GenNode. When changing the pitch of the waveform generated by the GenNode (by a PropertySlider, for instance), this class decides the new frequency according to the Mode that is assigned to the scale.
    Author:
    Marcel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
